title: The Monster Pumpkins
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 206 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 450L, Fiction Series
description: Monsters Lurk and Bonk decide to have a contest to see who can grow the biggest pumpkin. The loser has to make the winner a pumpkin pie. This book is great for introducing emergent readers to story elements. Humorous pictures support the text.
meta: contest, harvest, measures, pumpkin, sprout, weigh
